answerText: Thomas Stearns Eliot[10] One essay in The Sacred Wood is about this character "and His Problems." That essay popularized the term "objective correlative" and questioned the unexplained Polonius-Laertes scene in the play this character titles.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 8 | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: An essay collection by this author includes a reprint of "Tradition and the Individual Talent," and its early sections address "The Perfect Critic" and "Imperfect Critics." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of the essay collection The Sacred Wood, which includes sections on "Ben Jonson," "Blake," and "Dante."
